panels.description: Min RPS in the last 60 seconds
panels.title: Min QPS

targets.expr: sum(increase(idgame_handled_total{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", cid=~"$cid", tenant=~"$tenant", path!~".*ping.*", region!="xx"}[1m])) by(path, method)

sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_sum{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", cid=~"$cid", tenant=~"$tenant", path!~".*ping.*", region!="xx"}[1m]))by(path, method)/sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_count{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", cid=~"$cid", tenant=~"$tenant", path!~".*ping.*", region!="xx"}[1m]))by(path, method)
sum(increase(idgame_handled_total{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", cid=~"$cid", tenant=~"$tenant", status_code!~"200", path!~".*ping.*", region!="xx"}[1m])) by(path, method, status_code)

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_bucket{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", cid=~"$cid", tenant=~"$tenant", path!~".*ping.*", region!="xx"}[1m])) by (le, path, method))

histogram_quantile(0.75, sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_bucket{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", cid=~"$cid", tenant=~"$tenant", path!~".*ping.*", region!="xx"}[1m])) by (le, path, method))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_bucket{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", cid=~"$cid", tenant=~"$tenant", path!~".*ping.*", region!="xx"}[1m])) by (le, path, method))

sum(container_memory_rss{pod=~"#service_name#.*", pod!~".*-xx.*", pod!~".*-be.*"} ) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{pod=~"#service_name#.*", pod!~".*-xx.*", pod!~".*-be.*"}) by (pod) * 100
sum(increase(idgame_handled_total{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", cid=~"$cid", tenant=~"$tenant", path!~".*ping.*", region="xx"}[1m])) by(path, method)

sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_sum{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", tenant=~"$cid", path!~".*ping.*", region="xx"}[1m]))by(path, method)/sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_count{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", tenant=~"$cid", path!~".*ping.*", region="xx"}[1m]))by(path, method)
sum(increase(idgame_handled_total{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", cid=~"$cid", tenant=~"$tenant", status_code!~"200", path!~".*ping.*", region="xx"}[1m])) by(path, method, status_code)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_bucket{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", tenant=~"$cid", path!~".*ping.*", region="xx"}[1m])) by (le, path, method))
histogram_quantile(0.75, sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_bucket{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", tenant=~"$cid", path!~".*ping.*", region="xx"}[1m])) by (le, path, method))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(increase(idgame_handled_seconds_bucket{service="#service_name#-be",env=~"$env", tenant=~"$cid", path!~".*ping.*", region="xx"}[1m])) by (le, path, method))
